labs(y= expression(paste(delta^{15}, 'N (â€°)'), x = 'Genus'), fill = 'Samples')+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(face = "italic")) +
scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,4.5), expand = c(0, 0)) +
